labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord hangs forever, even upon restarting discord will hang. Delete your localstorage to get out of it
data.short_description: When adding the overlay to a program that has no forground presence, electron/discord stops responding and crashes
data.steps_to_repro: - Add a program as a game and enable the overlay - start that program and make sure the overlay loads - close that program and add a program like windows 10 mail as a game, make sure it has no windows open - hit the overlay toggle for the second program
